title: Denso - global revenue 2008 to 2019
yAxis: Net sales in million Japanese yen
summary: This is a bar chart representing Fiscal year in the x axis and Net sales in million Japanese yen in the y axis.
The Net sales in million Japanese yen is highest at Fiscal year 2019 and lowest at Fiscal year 2010.
There is a difference of 2386063.0 between the maximum Fiscal year 2019 and minimum Fiscal year 2010.
min_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Fiscal year, and Net sales in million Japanese yen in each Fiscal year on the y axis.
Fiscal year 2019 has the highest Net sales in million Japanese yen and 2010 has the lowest Net sales in million Japanese yen.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Fiscal year in the x axis and Net sales in million Japanese yen in the y axis.
The Net sales in million Japanese yen is highest at Fiscal year 2019 and lowest at Fiscal year 2010.
There is a difference of 2386063.0 between the maximum Fiscal year 2019 and minimum Fiscal year 2010.
max_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Fiscal year, and Net sales in million Japanese yen in each Fiscal year on the y axis.
The Net sales in million Japanese yen is highest at Fiscal year 2019 and lowest at Fiscal year 2010.
The difference of Net sales in million Japanese yen between the highest and lowest Fiscal year is 2386063.0.
The Fiscal year 2019 has the highest Net sales in million Japanese yen, followed by 2018, and 2017. Down to the Fiscal year 2010 which is the lowest.
The lowest value 2976709.0 at 2010 is almost 1.34 times smaller than the average value 3994911.92.
